page.title: 06BOSKEYDYKE FARM/INTERVIEW
page.content:
A man was interviewed from Boskeydyke Farm and these were his comments. 1)I like livin in Amcotts 2)I have been retired for a few years. 3)I used to use the land for agriculture and grew sugar-beet,wheat ,mustard,peas and potatoes. 4)Farming in this area is good 5)Foxes are a big pest in farming. 6)There was three tons of wheat, 12-15 tons of potatoes and 5 tons of sugar- beet sold outwards. 7)I used to have bullocks,pigs,cows ,horses and chickens.
In our area crops are oil-seed rape ,barley,wheat,peas,mustard and sugar -beet.There is especially a lot of fungi in the wheat.The land in the area is very fertile.There is one farm and one house in the area.Most of the land in the area is owned by big
